about.details:
Incorporated in 2010, The Ahmedabad-based Advait Infratech Limited company operates in the power infrastructure industry. The business has various verticals including Turnkey Telecommunication Projects, power transmission installation, Power substation, and telecom products, Liasioning-marketing, and many others to meet the demand of the power sector.

Till Sep 2020, the company has completed 100+ projects and has a clientele base of 100+ customers across the world. Cobra, Jindal Steel & Power, Siemens, Sterlite Power, Tata Projects Ltd, JSW Energy, KEC International Ltd, Kalpataru Power Transmission Ltd, NSG Group, NCC are some of its clients. Company has nationwide footprints through affiliated members in Delhi, Kolkata, Ahmedabad, Chennai, Baroda, Hyderabad, and Mumbai.

In 2019, Advait infratech has established an OPGW (Optical Fibre Ground Wire) and OFC cable manufacturing unit in Sanand, Gujarat through a joint venture with TG Group, a leading OFC manufacturer in China.

Product Portfolio

  1. Optical Fibre Groud Wire and OFC cables
  2. EHV (Extra High Voltage) transmission line insulators
  3. Tools for constructing transmission lines
  4. Gas insulators Sub Stations
  5. Earthing solutions
  6. Transmission line and Sub Station lines specialized products

Competitive strengths

  • Strong client base in domestic as well as overseas market
  • Diversified product portfolio
  • Strong order book value
  • Proven financial track record

faqs.question: What is the Advait Infratech SME IPO?
faqs.answer:
Advait Infratech SME IPO is a SME IPO of 1350000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹6.89 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹51 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on September 15, 2020, and closes on September 18, 2020.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Advait Infratech SME IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Advait Infratech SME IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Advait Infratech SME IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Advait Infratech SME IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Advait Infratech SME IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Advait Infratech SME IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Advait Infratech SME IPO opens on September 15, 2020 and closes on September 18, 2020.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Advait Infratech SME IPO?
faqs.answer: Advait Infratech SME IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,02,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Advait Infratech SME IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Advait Infratech SME IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Advait Infratech SME IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Advait Infratech SME IPO will be done on Friday, September 25, 2020, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, September 29, 2020. Check the Advait Infratech SME IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Advait Infratech SME IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Advait Infratech SME IPO listing date is on Monday, September 28, 2020.
